name: Claude
description: A family of foundational AI models that can be used in a variety of applications. Known for its large context window and strong performance in a wide range of tasks.

name: Canva Magic Studio
description: A suite of AI-powered features within Canva that can help you design, write, and edit with ease. Includes Magic Design, Magic Write, and more.

name: Zapier Agents
description: An experimental AI tool that can automate tasks across thousands of apps. You can create AI agents to handle complex workflows through a simple chat interface.

name: Notion Q&A
description: An AI feature in Notion that allows you to ask questions about your workspace content and get intelligent answers. It can help you find information, summarize documents, and more.

name: Tabnine
description: An AI code assistant that provides real-time code completions in your IDE. It supports a wide range of languages and editors.
